title: Riot, please be clear about changes to Orange Essence.
body:
I'm getting the distinct feeling that more than a few summoners aren't quite sure what's happening to Orange essence. - You've made it clear what's happening to Blue and Ip, but Orange seems to be in doubt.

- If their value is also changing, does that mean we should hold on to orange essence now?
- Should we start disenchanting skin shards?
- Should we forge the skins i want now? Or wait till preseason?

replies.body:
Hi everyone! I agree we haven't spelled this out as clearly as we should have. We did cover this in the preseason FAQ.

The TLDR is that ALL shard disenchant values are being changed from 33%  of value to 20% of value. So if you have shards lying around that you're not intending to use, we recommend disenchanting them before preseason kicks off on November 8th to get the most possible essence out of them. 

 More context below:

**Are you making any changes to the way disenchanting shards works?**

Since you'll be getting more shards thanks to the new leveling system (and with other recent changes to honor and events), we'll tune down the relative value of the essence you get from disenchanting shards of all types—champ shards, skin shards, and ward skin shards.

In the current system, for example, disenchanting a champ shard will get you about a third of the BE you need to buy a champ at that shard's tier. In the new system it'll get you 20% of the way there. Also, with so many more champ shards in the system, we need to remove the ability to reroll them into permanent champs—but we’ll occasionally sell mystery champions for blue essence. For these reasons, you should go ahead and reroll or disenchant any shards you don't want to upgrade before preseason hits so you can get the most essence possible out of them.

To make up for essence drop rate changes, we'll tune the way loot boxes work to increase the amount of skins you'll get from them. We'll also add "bad luck protection," so you won't ever go on long streaks without getting a skin shard or a gemstone from chests.
Wait, so are we still expecting to get more shards even if we are already level 30?

Level 30 is no longer going to be the level cap! League is going to be moving to a system similar to Overwatch, where you will be able to level up infinitely and will get a chance at champion/skin shards every time you do.
It's a good optional system but a terrible mandatory one. I hope league never stops selling skins normally.

Cannot say this enough. I also play HotS and Smite, and I have actively refused to buy loot chests there because it feels crappy to do. Let me just give you money for the thing I want, and I'll whale myself into homelesness. But make me feel like you're trying to trick me into it by manipulating me, and you won't get a penny.

Keep in mind that you can still directly get the things you want. Items will continue to disenchant into blue essence which will be used to purchase things in the shop just like IP does now. Not sure how it will feel overall, but supposedly the goal is to feel roughly the same as the current system, just with fewer currencies.
